entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
